body.p: Used to specify the query for a template. The attributes and content of the query are dependent on the type of datasource being used.

div.p: For RDF datasources, the query should contain one template.XULElem("content") element as well as template.XULElem("member") and/or template.XULElem("triple") elements. For XML datasources, the query should have an template.XULAttr("expr") attribute and may optionally contain template.XULElem("assign") elements. For SQL datasources, the query should contain an SQL statement as text.
